title: We have what you need and more! Come see our fantastic views!
posting_body: ['Shadow Lake', 'show contact info', 'Unit Details:', '2-BR 1-BA |', 'Square Footage:', '1200 sq ft |', 'Rental Rates:', '$1554/Month!', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Apartment Features:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Patio/Balcony', '● Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '● Sunroom', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Extended living room area', '● Fireplace in Select Units', '● Fully Equipped Kitchens', '● Hardwood Floors', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● In Unit Washer & Dryer', '● Upgrade Unit', '● Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '● Views', 'About Our Community:', "The living spaces at Shadow Lake Apartments are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Doraville, GA.", 'Wonderful Amenities:', '● Business Center', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Central Air', '● Clubhouse', '● Extended living room area', '● Fitness Center', '● Picnic Area with Grill', '● Smoke Free', '● Sparkling Swimming Pool', '● Tennis Courts', '● Clothes Care Center', '● Lake on Site', '● Laundry Facilities', '● MARTA Access', '● Pet Care', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Scenic Lake', '● Se Habla Espanol', '● Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '● Wooded Views', 'Contact Information:', 'Address:', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', 'We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '89F83FC5E4B0457']
